abstract: Donald Trump speaks with small group of African-American business owners and community leaders in Philadelphia, and has emotional meeting with mother of young woman who was killed by undocumented immigrant; visit is part of his campaign's efforts to win over African-American voters.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump met business and community leaders and had an emotional meeting with the mother of a young woman who was killed by undocumented immigrants.
snippet: Mr. Trump met business and community leaders and had an emotional meeting with the mother of a young woman who was killed by undocumented immigrants....

headline.main: Donald Trump Meets With Black Leaders Ahead of Detroit Church Visit
headline.print_headline: Immigration Is Targeted  as Trump Bids for Votes
